caption:
Shreyan got a global rank of 25 yesterday and got a crazy +71 on his already crazy high rating. He broke his own record of having the highest Codeforces rating in India.

He is now just 17 rating points short of giving India its first Legendary Grand Master.

Fun fact: He still has 1 attempt left at ICPC World Finals. There has never been a better opportunity for India to do this well at ICPC.

Rooting really hard for him.
